00010 #include "framework/Framework.h"
00011 #include "module/module.h"
00012 
00013 #if defined OS_WINDOWS
00014 #   include <windows.h>
00015 #   include <crtdbg.h>
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 using namespace module;
00019 using namespace Framework;
00020 
00021 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00022 {
00023     #if defined OS_WINDOWS
00024         //_crtBreakAlloc = 193;
00025         _CrtSetDbgFlag(_CRTDBG_ALLOC_MEM_DF | _CRTDBG_LEAK_CHECK_DF);
00026         #endif
00027 
00028         ModuleHandle fw(SHARED_LIB_NAME("framework"));
00029 
00030         com_ptr<IFrameworkFactory> factory;
00031         create_instance(factory, fw);
00032 
00033         com_ptr<IFramework> framework = factory->NewFramework(argc, argv, 0);
00034         framework->Init();
00035         framework->Start();
00036 
00037         com_ptr<IBundleContext> fwkContext = framework->getBundleContext();
00038 
00039         IBundle* console = fwkContext->InstallBundle("Framework.Console.exe");
00040 
00041         if(console) console->Start();
00042         else framework->Stop();
00043 
00044         framework->WaitForStop(0);
00045         return 0;
00046 }
